backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI-removal requirements and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for Valentine‑themed styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/PostYesMovieDate: Movie date confirmation page with poster, date, time, and themed styling.
frontend/src/components/ValentineAskPage: Main Valentine ask flow with evasive 'No' button, celebration, and transition to movie date page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global styles, and custom Valentine-themed OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, plus a float-up animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, Valentine theme extensions, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and tasks focused on removing all photo-upload UI.
